review: I purchased a roku ready TV. Had the first roku for a week. It would continually fall out of the hdmi port. I returned the item through Amazon and it was replaced. The second roku stick worked but the remote wouldn't stay paired. We re synced the remote multiple times a day, changed batteries until the remote died. Now the seller won't replace the faulty remote or take it back even know I have directly contacted roku customer service. Too much hassle.
author: Stacey

review: Product stopped working after 45 Days - thought cord was bad so bought new cord and still doesnt work. Please credit my account due to defective product or send me a new roku (not a stick) and I'll pay the difference
